history.proof: scongruence use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_0_l, Rmult_1_r, Ropp_0, Rmult_assoc, Rmult_0_l, sqrt_Rsqr_abs unfold: Copp, Rsqr, C, Cmod, RtoC, pow, snd, fst.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Cmod_norm (Cmod _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment x : R Unable to unify "sqrt ?M2363² = Rabs ?M2363" with "sqrt (fst x ^ 2 + snd x ^ 2) = (if Rcase_abs x then (- x)%R else x)".

original: intros x. unfold Cmod, Rabs, norm. rewrite Cmod_norm. apply sqrt_Rsqr_abs.
